sentences.cn: 阿德里安无可挑剔的法语

sentences.en: But then, just as this almost flawless operation was nearing completion, disaster struck.
sentences.cn: 然而, 正当这个几乎完美无缺的行动接近结束时, 突然发生了不幸事故.

sentences.en: Desdemona's image is one of flawless goddess images in Shakespeare's writing.
sentences.cn: 苔丝狄蒙娜形象是莎士比亚笔下完美的圣母形象.

sentences.en: Discovery's takeoff this morning from Cape Canaveral was flawless.
sentences.cn: “发现”号航天飞机今晨从卡纳维拉尔角顺利发射升空。
她的英语几乎无可挑剔。

sentences.en: Her flawless performance won rave reviews from the critics.
sentences.cn: 她完美无缺的表演赢得剧评家的大力称赞.

sentences.en: Her skin was flawless and seemed opalescent.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤洁白无瑕,好象乳色的.

sentences.en: Hollis'performance had been calm and flawless.
sentences.cn: 霍利斯的表演沉着冷静,无懈可击.

sentences.en: Large and flawless crystals are not common, as you may possibly know.
sentences.cn: 你大概知道,无瑕的巨大水晶石是不常有的.

sentences.en: One day she was pink and flawless; another pale and tragical.
sentences.cn: 有的时候,她就娇妍、完美; 另有的时候,她就灰白戚楚.

sentences.en: She attributed her flawless complexion to the moisturiser she used.
sentences.cn: 她将自己无瑕的肌肤归功于所使用的保湿霜。

sentences.en: She has pink cheeks and a flawless complexion.
sentences.cn: 她面颊粉红,面部皮肤光洁无瑕.

sentences.en: The flawless launch was watched by millions of people on television.
sentences.cn: 有数百万电视观众收看了这次成功的发射.

sentences.en: You can't help noticing her flawless beauty.
sentences.cn: 你不能不注意她那完美无缺的姿容.

words.tran_cn: 瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风
使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷
完美的；无瑕疵的；无裂缝的

trans.tran_en: having no mistakes or marks, or not lacking anything
